feature: Added automatic scaling based on workload.
bugfix: Resolved an issue where logs were not properly collected from certain nodes.
Fixed a memory leak in the metrics collection service.
security: Enhanced encryption for data at rest and in transit.
Addressed CVE-2024-12345 related to Kubernetes API.

feature: Integrated advanced monitoring tools for cluster health.
Support for automated backup and recovery processes.
bugfix: Fixed cluster auto-upgrade failures under specific network conditions.
security: Patched a vulnerability in the authentication module.

feature: Introduced support for managing multiple clusters.
Added support for managing Kubernetes resources using Helm.
bugfix: Fixed a bug that caused the application to crash when switching between clusters.
security: Updated security protocols to prevent unauthorized access to clusters.
